channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The time is now: Only 5 days remain to book your exhibit table at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: If you’ve been thinking about joining 10,000+ startup and VC leaders at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 in San Francisco on October 27–29, the time to act is ...

item.title: California becomes first state to regulate AI companion chatbots
item.description: SB 243 is designed to protect children and vulnerable users from harms associated with use of AI companion chatbots.

item.title: How to Make STEM Funny—and Go Viral Doing It
item.description: If you stayed awake in science class as a kid, the payoff comes when you get a good laugh out of Freya McGhee’s jokes.

item.title: 3 Best Smart Displays (2025): Tested By a Smart Home Addict

item.title: Salesforce announces Agentforce 360 as enterprise AI competition heats up
item.description: Salesforce announces an upgraded version of its Agentforce platform designed to help enterprises build and deploy AI agents.

item.title: Final Flash Sale: Save up to $624 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 pass — Ends Oct 17

item.title: Programming in Assembly Is Brutal, Beautiful, and Maybe Even a Path to Better AI
item.description: Whether your chip is running a vintage computer game or the latest DeepSeek model, it’ll reward you for speaking its native language.

item.title: New Rules Could Force Tesla to Redesign Its Door Handles. That’s Harder Than It Sounds
item.description: Proposed regulations in China would mean the end of flush handles on car doors, with precious little time to roll out the changes.

item.title: Slate Auto’s electric truck: See it here first at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025

item.title: Best Windows Laptops (2025): WIRED-Tested Laptops to Buy
item.description: If you can’t upgrade to Windows 11 with a simple software update, these are the best Windows 11 laptops to buy right now.
